column5: Well guys spent the day at the YBC 5 pin provincial finals, my daughter was competing in the junior single division and had a shot at going to the National that is hosted in the greater Toronto area this coming May 2nd - 4th.   She played 5 games and had a 190 average.  Not bad for a 13 year old   She was able to finish 3rd and got a bronze medal.   I'm real proud of her accomplishment  and could not ask for anything better.   She had a good time and that's what counts.  Here's a pic of my champion    Thought I'd share this moment with you Leechman
Leechman, that's awesome!!!   I am sure you are extremely proud of her...  I suck so badly at 5 pin it's not funny, I'll stick to fishing, lol
Thanks Bill.... I don't play against her no more cause she beats the crap out of me LOL I'll stick to fishing too LOL
Congratulations to your daughter Jacques. Well done. It's great to see kids doing well at sports.
3rd in Provincials, thats awesome.   Congrats to your daughter. These are memories that last a life time.  Cheers.

Wow!  Congrats!  Brings back lots of memories.  I was with the YBC for years...was on a travelling team that went all over southern Ontario...  3rd place is an awesome accomplishment!  Now..wonder if I still have those old bowling shirts....with those patches all over them....LOL.
congrats on her 3rd place well done
Congratulations!!! Really brings back memories... from the basement of the Oshawa Centre.... with my bright yellow bowling shirt covered in patches!!!
